__TOC__

This deadline marks the date where <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu|translations for Ubuntu]]</nowiki> are due. Translations done up until this date will be '''automatically''' included in the final release's language packs.

Generally language pack deadlines are on '''Tuesdays''', and the corresponding language packs are released on the '''following Thursday'''. For those interested in more details, feel free to <nowiki>[[https://dev.launchpad.net/Translations/LanguagePackSchedule|consult the language pack creation schedule]]</nowiki>.

=== Translations outside language packs ===

Some translation data cannot currently be updated via the language pack mechanism. For the packages affected, it is the responsibility of the maintainer to '''manually''':

# Export translations from Launchpad
# Integrate translations in the package
# Do a package upload including translations

Translations which fall into this category are:

* The Ubuntu installation packages:
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/quantal/+source/debian-installer/|Debian installer]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/quantal/+source/ubiquity|Ubiquity]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/quantal/+source/ubiquity-slideshow-ubuntu| The Ubiquity Slideshow]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/wubi|WUBI]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/quantal/+source/gfxboot-theme-ubuntu|The bootloader]]</nowiki>
* Translations which don't use gettext, including:
** The <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/quantal/+source/debconf|debconf]]</nowiki> template (please coordinate the translation with <nowiki>[[Translations-Upstream-Debian|Debian upstream]]</nowiki>)
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ddtp-ubuntu|Package description translations]]</nowiki>.
* Translations included in the source packages
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/quantal/+source/xdg-user-dirs| XDG User Dirs]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/quantal/+source/language-selector|Language selector]]</nowiki> (including the notification of missing language support)

* Ubuntu documentation
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/quantal/+source/ubuntu-docs/|Ubuntu Docs]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/quantal/+source/kubuntu-docs/|Kubuntu Docs]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/quantal/+source/software-center/|Software Center]]</nowiki>

{*} ''Packages that should contain translations themselves are listed <nowiki>[[http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-core-dev/pkgbinarymangler/ubuntu/annotate/head%3A/striptranslations.blacklist|here]]</nowiki>''
